<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ricochet Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3193) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117) (Level 14)

</column>

---

You bounce your shot off a nearby surface to strike your opponent from an unexpected angle. Attempt a Strike with a firearm or crossbow. When determining whether a target has cover from this Strike, you can choose one solid surface within your weapon’s first range increment to ricochet your shot off of. If you do, you determine the target’s cover from the point where you ricochet your shot instead of from you.

<title level="2">Ricochet Shot leads to...</title>
[Ricochet Master](/Feats.aspx?ID=3207)
name: Ricochet Shot
